Posted By: Mowagh (1/23/2013 6:23:48 AM)

posts.post_content:
More complex?? I'm not sure what could be "more complex" unless you add in hexproof or some random 1 line ability... But the possibilities with this card are ridiculous.   
  
Say you have a [Shambleshark](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shambleshark) and it's beefed up to a 5/4 by turn 5-6, then you play this card. Prime speaker enters with 5 +1/+1 counters(as a 6/6), it evolves the Crab fish and you draw 6 cards... If you [Ghostly Flicker](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ghostly Flicker) or use [Zameck Guildmage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zameck Guildmage) then it only gets better, giving you a huge pool to choose from. [Simic Charm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Simic Charm) to protect it from removal. Use [Bioshift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bioshift) in response to its draw card ability going on the stack and you can move counters from something onto her, to draw more cards(even better, use it to move those fresh new counters from the Prime Speaker on to your shark or [Elusive Krasis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Elusive Krasis) to finish the game quickly.)  
  
Great art, i really dig the helmet. She's powerful, unique and gives even... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)

posts.post_content:
Flavorfully strange, but Zegana loves her some championed creature in bant exalted.  
Just player her after the combat step when your lone attacker is huge.  
  
Also, extra bonus for evolving a [Renegade Krasis](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Renegade Krasis). If you have a Renegade Krasis AND a [Fathom Mage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fathom Mage) out it's even better.
posts.html:

Also, extra bonus for evolving a Renegade Krasis. If you have a Renegade Krasis AND a Fathom Mage out it's even better.

posts.post_content: Zegana is the second best of the RTR/GC guild-leaders, second only to the incredibly irritating [Obzedat, Ghost Council](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Obzedat, Ghost Council). With Simic, you should have no problem making her huge, and if you run Master Biomancer, it should only make it easier to make her gigantic. And the draw engine you get from here always gives you option.

posts.post_content:
Zegana probably has to be my favorite guild leader Next to Niv-Mizzet because of what she can do. Most of the time i can bring her out with 10+ +1/+1 counters, making her the most powerful creature on my side of the field, and giving me a bunch of cards... :D  
  
It's obviously bad to draw a crud ton of cards at the risk of having to discard them, but if you have a Reliquary Tower out, Hakuna Matata.  
  
Having said that, for any fellow Simic members out there, I'd run at least 2 Reliq. Towers in your deck if you also have Zegana in it.
posts.html:
